#labels Featured
Chord is developed and maintained primarily by [http://berkeley.intel-research.net/mnaik/ Mayur Naik] who is currently a researcher at Intel Labs Berkeley.

Additionally, the following people have contributed to algorithms underlying the program analyses distributed with Chord:

  * [http://www.cs.stanford.edu/~aiken/ Alex Aiken], Stanford University
  * [http://berkeley.intel-research.net/dgay/ David Gay], Intel Labs Berkeley
  * Chang-Seo Park, UC Berkeley
  * [http://www.cs.berkeley.edu/~ksen/ Koushik Sen], UC Berkeley
